resources.string: The detected barcode format is not supported; try rescanning, then searching manually.
Failed to get the selected search provider. Try resetting it, and if this persists, file a bug report.
Got it! Check the history screen.
Bad provider format. Put a \"%s\" in ISBN location.
Resource added. Try exiting and re-entering the menu to see it. (Sorry, I was too lazy to get this to work \"properly.\" The app\'s free. Suck it up)
You have both history and autosearch turned off. Turn at least one on in the settings.
